content: **this crochet hot pad pattern is perfect for valentine s day it has a nice thickness and a textured stitch pattern ** **size ** one size - 7 x 9 5 **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet 2 stitches together half_double_crochet **yarn ** 100 yards of #4 worsted weight cotton lion brand 24/7 cotton or i love this cotton or suitable substitutes 2 strands held together **hook size ** us size k/10 5 6 5mm crochet hook or a larger size if you have tight gauge **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer
